item.title: jqGrid: Handling array data !!!
item.description: This post is primarily a personal reference. I also consider this a tribute to Oleg, who played a big role in improving my understanding of the jqGrid internals â€“ the way it handles source data types, which, if I may say, led him in discovering a bug in jqGrid.
